description: Babo is http://anidb.net/ch7571 [Hei]`s Neighbor, has only one line, at the end of the OVA episode, despite appearing more frequently than other tenants. Caught Ootsuka Mayu spying on Hei and became convinced she was stalking himself. Brought flowers for her at the end of the OVA but stated in his one line that, "She isn`t coming, is she?"
name: Babo
